explains: v. 使困惑，难住；抑制，控制

sentences.en: Sometimes the decisions baffle and enrage me.
sentences.cn: 有时候作出的决定使我困惑甚至愤怒。

sentences.en: Top 20 children's questions which baffle parents.
sentences.cn: 最让父母挠头的孩子提问前20名。

sentences.en: The swindler tried to baffle him out of his money, but in vain.
sentences.cn: 骗子想骗取他的钱，可是没成功。
